text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: It's the day of tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Today's the day! I just knowI'm gonna win this time!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Well, yeah! I've trained so hard,and eaten so many carrots, howcould I not be?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Although, I might've had a few too<n>many carrots, hehe. I'm
sure it's fine!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: So this is where you've been.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: We're here to cheer you on, Urara!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: King! Spe! Thanks for coming, guys!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
You trained with the mighty King Halo<n>herself, you only have
to go out there<n>and win now.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah, no problem! I'm definitely<n>winning this!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
I know you can do it! Just remember<n>your training, and
you'll soar down<n>the track!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Remember my training... Okay!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I'll just think of all the times you<n>stuffed your face with
snacks! Or the<n>time you tripped and got covered in<n>mud!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Y-you don't have to rememberthose parts of training!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The third tryout race will begin shortly.<n>Runners, please
make your way to the<n>starting gate.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ah, that's me! I better get going!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Thanks! Don't take your eyes off me,<n>okay? See you after
the race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At last, Haru Urara's tryout race<n>begins.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are racing through the<n>dirt course, no doubt
with the Twinkle<n>Series on their minds!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Now who's this bringing up the rear?<n>Why, it's Haru Urara!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Could she be conserving her energy...<n>doesn't look like it!
She's giving it her<n>all, but she's still trailing behind the<n>
pack!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You can do it, Urara!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Give it everything you've got!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text: Go, Urara, go!

text_block_list.name: Neighbor Lady
text_block_list.text: Show them what you're made of!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everyone who has had their spirits<n>lifted by Haru Urara's
infectious<n>optimism has gathered to cheer her<n>on.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As the race reaches its conclusion...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
...And across the line! Our winner has<n>finished, followed
shortly by the rest<n>of the pack!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Will the ever-upbeat racer's hard<n>work pay off at long last?
Haru<n>Urara's final placement is...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Woohoo! Ninth place! I've never done<n>that well before!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, Urara! That was an<n>amazing race.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Indeed. You gave it your all, right up to<n>the very end.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I guess that's the exciting thing about<n>races. You never
know what's gonna<n>happen!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
Good job today, Urara. Here, these<n>carrots are on the
house!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Really?! Yippee! This is just what I<n>need to prepare for the
next race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, Haru Urara finishes ninth out<n>of ten runners.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Well, that takes care of the tryouts.<n>What a blast!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I still can't believe it. Ninth<n>place!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: But I just know I'll take firstplace next time! I can't wait until thenext tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Being so optimistic in the face of<n>defeat isn't as simple as
she makes it<n>look.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maybe that's what makes Haru<n>Urara so compelling to the
people<n>around her... including me.
choice_data_list:
Then do you want to aim for first place with
me?

Then do you want to aim for first place with
me?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wow! You're really gonna help me<n>train some more?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Scouting me...?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: What?! You want to recruit ME?!Seriously?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yippee! Then that means I can run in<n>the Twinkle Series!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
If I make my debut there, I'll be able<n>to run in all sorts of
races!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
And I'll get first place in every single<n>one! Oooh, I can't
wait!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for scouting me! I'll make it<n>worth your while and
win lots and lots<n>of races!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that decree, my journey with the<n>endlessly optimistic
Haru Urara<n>begins.
